messages.author: Sarah Chen
messages.text: FYI - Store #Store-191 came in $15K under budget on electrical work. Worth understanding what drove that variance.

messages.author: Tom Wilson
messages.text: We used the backup vendor TempMaster who had better pricing than our usual contractor. Quality was good, no issues.

messages.author: Jennifer Liu
messages.text: Interesting. Is TempMaster someone we should add to our primary vendor rotation?

messages.author: Sarah Chen
messages.text: I'd recommend it. They were responsive, delivered on time, and pricing was 12% lower than our standard rate.

messages.author: Tom Wilson
messages.text: Let me reach out to them about establishing a preferred vendor relationship. Could generate savings across our portfolio.

threads.summary: Discussed cost variance on completed store. Identified backup vendor with better pricing for potential preferred vendor status.

action_items.description: Let me reach out to them about establishing a preferred vendor relationship. Could generate savings
